body: Fundamental concepts of programming language design, specifications, and implementation; programming language paradigms and features; program verification.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: CMPSC221 ; CMPSC360)(Additional Attributes: NONE)

title: CMPSC 461: Programming Language Concepts
